content.heading: HTML Comments
paragraphs: HTML comments are not displayed in the browser, but they can help document your HTML source code.

content.heading: HTML Comment Tag
paragraphs: You can add comments to your HTML source by using the following syntax: <!-- Write your comments here -->.
Notice that there is an exclamation point (!) in the start tag, but not in the end tag.
